title: WHIRLING F1 ORB / dialogue home
description: where is home, what is home afterthought

dialogueTree.title: Encyclopedia: "By the way, where *is* home? The ad..."
dialogueTree.english: By the way, where *is* home? The address is coming up blank and this place sure isn't it...
dialogueTree.polish: A swoją drogą, *gdzie* jest twój dom? Próżno szukasz w głowie adresu, a tutaj nie mieszkasz na pewno...
dialogueTree.belarusian: Дарэчы, а *дзе* дом? Замест адраса ў галаву прыходзіць пустата, а тое, што навокал — дакладна не дом...

links.title: You: "Do I even have one?"
links.english: Do I even have one?
links.polish: A mam w ogóle jakiś?
links.belarusian: А ў мяне ён наогул ёсць?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "But you've been at this hostel-cafe..."
links.english: But you've been at this hostel-cafeteria for only three nights. Where were you before? You had to be somewhere.
links.polish: Ale spędziłeś w tym hostelu czy barze dopiero trzy noce. Gdzie byłeś wcześniej? Gdzieś musiałeś.
links.belarusian: Ну, ты правёў у гэтым бары-хостэле толькі тры ночы. Дзе ты быў раней? Недзе ты мусіў быць.

links.title: You: "I don't know... near? South maybe."
links.english: I don't know... near? South maybe.
links.polish: Nie wiem... Niedaleko? Może gdzieś na południu?
links.belarusian: Я не ведаю... паблізу? Магчыма, дзесьці на поўдні.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You don't really know, do you?"
links.english: You don't really know, do you?
links.polish: Tak naprawdę to nie wiesz, co?
links.belarusian: Папраўдзе ты не ведаеш, так?

links.title: You: "I don't. Does this mean I'm homeles..."
links.english: I don't. Does this mean I'm homeless?
links.polish: Nie. Czy to znaczy, że jestem bezdomny?
links.belarusian: Не. Ці азначае гэта, што я бяздомны?

links.title: Encyclopedia: ""South maybe" doesn't sound like so..."
links.english: "South maybe" doesn't sound like somewhere you can stay if you run out of money.
links.polish: „Może gdzieś na południu” nie brzmi jak miejsce, w które mógłbyś się wybrać, kiedy skończą ci się pieniądze.
links.belarusian: "Магчыма, дзесьці на поўдні" не гучыць як нешта, дзе ты мог бы жыць, калі скончацца грошы.

links.title: You: "Could I trace the way back somehow?..."
links.english: Could I trace the way back somehow? To the exact street, the exact number on a building...
links.polish: A mógłbym jakoś prześledzić trasę do niego? Na dokładną ulicę, dokładny numer na budynku...
links.belarusian: А мог бы я нейкім чынам прасачыць дарогу назад? Да той самай вуліцы, да таго самага нумару на будынку...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You can try. Run some addresses in..."
links.english: You can try. Run some addresses in your head when you get the time. Maybe a street or an apartment will appear.
links.polish: Możesz spróbować. Zastanów się w wolnej chwili nad różnymi adresami. Może pojawi ci się w pamięci ulica albo mieszkanie.
links.belarusian: Ты можаш паспрабаваць. Падумай у вольны час пра розныя адрасы. Магчыма, табе ўзгадаюцца вуліца або кватэра.

links.title: You: "I'll live in a dumpster, I don't ca..."
links.english: I'll live in a dumpster, I don't care. Fuck everything. Hobocop.
links.polish: Będę mieszkał w śmietniku, co mnie to. Jebać wszystko. Żulicjant.
links.belarusian: Я буду жыць у сметніцы, мне напляваць. Да чорта ўсё гэта. Коп-бадзяга.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Entertain the thought when you get..."
links.english: Entertain the thought when you get the time. Maybe being a hobo *and* a cop has its advantages?
links.polish: Pochyl się nad tą myślą, jak będziesz miał chwilę. Może bycie *i* żulem, *i* policjantem miałoby swoje dobre strony?
links.belarusian: Пакруці гэтую думку ў галаве, як будзе хвіліна. Верагодна, атрымаецца знайсці пэўныя перавагі ў тым, каб быць бадзягам *і* копам?

links.title: You: "I have only a vague, blackened imag..."
links.english: I have only a vague, blackened image.
links.polish: Mam tylko niejasny, pociemniały obraz.
links.belarusian: У мяне ёсць толькі невыразны, засмужаны вобраз.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A vague, blackened image doesn't so..."
links.english: A vague, blackened image doesn't sound like somewhere you can stay if you run out of money.
links.polish: Niejasny, pociemniały obraz nie brzmi jak miejsce, w które mógłbyś się wybrać, kiedy skończą ci się pieniądze.
links.belarusian: Невыразны, засмужаны вобраз не гучыць як нешта, дзе ты мог бы жыць, калі скончацца грошы.

links.title: You: "Far away?"
links.english: Far away?
links.polish: Daleko stąd?
links.belarusian: Далёка адсюль?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "In time or space?"
links.english: In time or space?
links.polish: W czasie czy przestrzeni?
links.belarusian: У часе ці ў прасторы?

links.title: You: "In time."
links.english: In time.
links.polish: W czasie.
links.belarusian: У часе.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "That doesn't sound like somewhere y..."
links.english: That doesn't sound like somewhere you can stay if you run out of money.
links.polish: To raczej nie brzmi jak miejsce, w które mógłbyś się wybrać, kiedy skończą ci się pieniądze.
links.belarusian: Гэта не гучыць як нешта, дзе ты мог бы жыць, калі скончацца грошы.

links.title: You: "In space."
links.english: In space.
links.polish: W przestrzeni.
links.belarusian: У прасторы.

links.title: You: "Both."
links.english: Both.
links.polish: W jednym i drugim.
links.belarusian: У абаіх.

links.title: You: "Up on Marvel Hill."
links.english: Up on Marvel Hill.
links.polish: Na Cudownej Górze.
links.belarusian: На Чароўным Пагорку.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Why did you say that?"
links.english: Why did you say that?
links.polish: Czemu to powiedziałeś?
links.belarusian: Чаму ты гэта сказаў?

links.title: You: "These are just synapses firing. It..."
links.english: These are just synapses firing. It doesn't mean anything.
links.polish: To tylko praca moich synaps. To nic nie znaczy.
links.belarusian: Усяго толькі работа маіх сінапсаў. Гэта нічога не значыць.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You don't really know, do you?"
links.english: You don't really know, do you?
links.polish: Tak naprawdę to nie wiesz, co?
links.belarusian: На самой справе ты не ведаеш, так?

links.title: You: "I don't. Does this mean I'm homeles..."
links.english: I don't. Does this mean I'm homeless?
links.polish: Nie. Czy to znaczy, że jestem bezdomny?
links.belarusian: Не. Ці азначае гэта, што я бяздомны?

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Something produced by the random fi..."
links.english: Something produced by the random firing of synapses doesn't sound like a place you can stay if you run out of money.
links.polish: Coś, co zrodziło się przypadkowo z pracy synaps, nie brzmi jak miejsce, w które mógłbyś się wybrać, kiedy skończą ci się pieniądze.
links.belarusian: Нешта, што ўзнікла выпадкова з работы сінапсаў, не гучыць як месца, дзе ты мог бы жыць, калі скончацца грошы.

links.title: You: "I have only a vague, blackened imag..."
links.english: I have only a vague, blackened image.
links.polish: Mam tylko niejasny, pociemniały obraz.
links.belarusian: У мяне ёсць толькі невыразны, засмужаны вобраз.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A vague, blackened image doesn't so..."
links.english: A vague, blackened image doesn't sound like somewhere you can stay if you run out of money.
links.polish: Niejasny, pociemniały obraz nie brzmi jak miejsce, w które mógłbyś się wybrać, kiedy skończą ci się pieniądze.
links.belarusian: Невыразны, засмужаны вобраз не гучыць як нешта, дзе ты мог бы жыць, калі скончацца грошы.

links.title: You: "The name must have some meaning for..."
links.english: The name must have some meaning for me.
links.polish: Ta nazwa musi mieć dla mnie jakieś znaczenie.
links.belarusian: Гэтая назва павінна мець для мяне нейкае значэнне.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The old thesaurus comes up empty. M..."
links.english: The old thesaurus comes up empty. Maybe you should ask the lieutenant.
links.polish: W tezaurusie swojego umysłu nic takiego nie znajdujesz. Może lepiej spytaj porucznika.
links.belarusian: У старым тэзаўрусе твайго розуму пуста. Можа, табе лепей спытаць лейтэнанта.

links.title: You: ""Lieutenant Kitsuragi, do you know..."
links.english: "Lieutenant Kitsuragi, do you know a place called Marvel Hill?"
links.polish: „Poruczniku Kitsuragi, czy znasz miejsce zwane Cudowną Górą?”
links.belarusian: "Лейтэнанце Кіцурагі, ці вядома табе месца пад назвай Чароўны Пагорак?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No..." He thinks for a moment. "Bu..."
links.english: "No..." He thinks for a moment. "But isn't that an expression, not a place?"
links.polish: „Nie...” – zastanawia się przez chwilę. „Ale czy to nie jest powiedzenie, a nie miejsce?”
links.belarusian: "Не... — ён задумваецца на момант. — Але гэта хутчэй алегорыя, чым месца, ці не так?"

links.title: You: ""An expression?""
links.english: "An expression?"
links.polish: „Powiedzenie?”
links.belarusian: "Алегорыя?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A saying. Up on Marvel Hill -- a g..."
links.english: "A saying. Up on Marvel Hill -- a great, high place. One that is impossible to climb back to."
links.polish: „Powiedzenie. Być na cudownej górze, czyli w jakimś wspaniałym, niedostępnym miejscu. Takim, do którego nie sposób wrócić”.
links.belarusian: "Прымаўка. На Чароўным Пагорку — у якімсьці цудоўным, высокім месцы. Такім, на якое немагчыма ўзысці нанова".

links.title: You: "I really don't remember."
links.english: I really don't remember.
links.polish: Naprawdę nie pamiętam.
links.belarusian: Я сапраўды не памятаю.

links.title: You: "As I said, I don't think I have one..."
links.english: As I said, I don't think I have one.
links.polish: Jak mówiłem, chyba go po prostu nie mam.
links.belarusian: Як я і казаў, здаецца, у мяне яго няма.

links.title: You: "I have no idea."
links.english: I have no idea.
links.polish: Nie mam pojęcia.
links.belarusian: Я не маю паняцця.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.english: [Discard thought.]
links.polish: [Odrzuć myśl].
links.belarusian: [Адкінуць думку.]
